title: GKV Smart Energy corporate website (5-page, responsive, SEO-friendly) — Frontend plan

requirements.summary: Implement a consistent site shell (header + mobile navigation + footer) across all pages with active nav indication.
acceptanceCriteria: A header navigation is present on all pages with links to Home, About Us, Services, Projects/Portfolio, Contact Us.
Navigation is usable on mobile (no horizontal overflow; menu is reachable and tappable).
A footer is present on all pages and includes company contact details (address/phone/email placeholders if needed).

file_operations.description: Create a responsive header with desktop nav and a mobile drawer/hamburger pattern; use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Sheet/Drawer) to implement accessible navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a consistent footer with contact details placeholders (address/phone/email) and simple secondary links; match the green/blue-on-white theme.
Create a shared layout wrapper that renders SiteHeader + main content + SiteFooter; ensure active nav state support (e.g., via router NavLink).
Wire the SiteLayout around all page routes and ensure navigation links exist for Home, About, Services, Projects/Portfolio, Contact.

requirements.summary: Build the Home page with required sections, exact hero copy/CTAs, highlights, why-choose, testimonials, and footer contact details.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page renders the exact hero headline and CTA button labels as provided.
Service highlights appear as 4 distinct cards with the provided titles.
“Why Choose GKV Smart Energy” section and testimonials are present with professional, simple English copy.
CTAs are clickable and navigate to the Contact page and/or contact form section (no broken links).

file_operations.description: Implement Home page sections: hero (exact headline “GKV Smart Energy – Powering a Sustainable Future”, subheading, 2 CTAs), intro paragraph, 4 service highlight cards, “Why Choose GKV Smart Energy”, testimonials, and link CTAs to Contact route/section. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Button) for cards/buttons. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Home page route and ensure header navigation points to it; ensure CTAs navigate correctly to Contact.

Create a dedicated section component rendering the 4 required service highlight cards (Residential Solar Solutions, Commercial & Industrial Solar, Rooftop Solar Installation, Maintenance & Support). Use shadcn-ui Card for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a testimonials section with professional, simple English testimonial copy and a clean card/list layout; use shadcn-ui Card for items. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Create the About Us page with overview, vision, mission, and experience/expertise/reliability content using semantic headings.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page includes clearly labeled sections for Overview, Vision, Mission, and Experience/Expertise/Reliability.
Vision and Mission statements match the intent provided and are written in simple, business-focused English.
Page uses semantic headings (H1 for page title; H2/H3 for sections).

file_operations.description: Implement About Us page with H1 title and H2/H3 sections: Overview, Vision (clean/renewable/cost-effective energy), Mission (high-quality solar solutions + customer satisfaction), and Experience/Expertise/Reliability content in a trustworthy tone.
Register the About Us route and wire it into the header navigation active-state behavior.

requirements.summary: Create a scannable Services page listing all five required offerings with short descriptions and responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: All five services are present with the exact service names (minor punctuation variations allowed).
Each service includes a brief, professional description oriented to Indian residential/commercial/industrial customers.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Implement Services page as a responsive grid/list of 5 service cards/sections with required names and short descriptions for Indian customers. Use shadcn-ui Card for scannable layout. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Services route and wire it into the site navigation.

requirements.summary: Create Projects/Portfolio page with responsive image gallery and per-project capacity + client benefits.
acceptanceCriteria: Projects/Portfolio page contains a gallery-style grid of project items with images (using generated placeholder images if real photos are not provided).
Each project item displays capacity (e.g., kW) and at least 1–2 client benefit bullets.
Gallery is responsive (grid adapts to mobile/tablet/desktop).

file_operations.description: Implement Projects/Portfolio page with a responsive gallery grid; each project card shows a static image, capacity (kW), and 1–2 benefit bullets. Use shadcn-ui Card for project items. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Projects/Portfolio route and wire it into the header navigation.
Add a small static projects dataset used by ProjectsPage including capacity and benefit bullets; reference generated images by their exact paths under frontend/public/assets/generated.

requirements.summary: Create Contact Us page with contact details, validated contact form fields, and a visible Google Map placeholder area.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays address, phone, and email in a clearly readable layout.
Contact form includes the four specified fields and basic validation (required fields; email format; mobile numeric/length check).
A visible “Google Map” placeholder block exists (embed can be a placeholder if no map URL is provided).

file_operations.description: Implement Contact page with address/phone/email sections, a contact form (Name, Mobile, Email, Message) with basic client-side validation, and a visible Google Map placeholder block. Use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button/Alert (or similar) for consistent UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Extract the contact form into a reusable component handling controlled inputs, validation, submit state (loading/success/error), and no page reload. Use shadcn-ui form inputs and alerts for status messaging. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Contact route and ensure Home CTAs link here; optionally support an anchor/scroll-to-form if implemented.

requirements.summary: Wire contact form submit to the existing backend call and show success/failure status without page reload.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the contact form triggers a backend call and returns a success response when stored.
The UI displays a non-technical success message on successful submission and a non-technical error message on failure.
Backend stores submissions with at least: name, mobile, email, message, and a timestamp.
No external email/SMS service is used; submissions are stored in-canister.

file_operations.description: Create a small service wrapper that calls the backend capability to submit the contact form; use the core-infrastructure backend connection configuration already present in the template (import and usage to be verified in repo). Ensure the call is awaited and errors are handled.

Connect form submission to the contactSubmissions service; show non-technical success/error messages inline without reload and disable submit while pending. Note: backend interface currently accepts (name, email, message); include mobile by incorporating it into the submitted message if needed until backend supports a dedicated mobile field.
Update the frontend type declarations if needed to reflect the final backend submission shape used by the UI (keep types aligned with the generated actor bindings used in core-infrastructure).

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent clean green/blue solar-themed visual design system with modern typography and responsive spacing across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent design language (colors, typography, button styles, card styles).
Color palette is predominantly white with green & blue accents (no heavy dark theme).
Typography is modern and legible with consistent heading/body hierarchy.
Responsive behavior verified for common widths (mobile, tablet, desktop) with no overflow issues.

file_operations.description: Define/adjust global CSS variables and base styles to implement a white background with green/blue accents, modern typography, consistent spacing, and accessible focus styles; avoid heavy dark theme.
Extend theme tokens (if needed) for brand accent greens/blues and consistent radii/shadows; keep the design system consistent with CSS variables used by shadcn-ui.

Ensure header layout, spacing, and mobile behavior follow the design system; avoid overflow on small widths. Use shadcn-ui primitives for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure footer typography, spacing, and link styles match the design system and remain readable on mobile.

requirements.summary: Implement SEO-friendly page structure: semantic headings, keyword-aware copy, and per-page title/meta description.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has a single H1 and logical H2/H3 structure.
Copy naturally includes the target keywords without keyword stuffing.
Each page sets an appropriate document title and meta description reflecting the page content.

file_operations.description: Add a small utility/hook to set document title and update/create the meta description tag on route changes/pages (SPA-friendly).

Ensure a single H1 and logical H2/H3 headings; include target keywords naturally (e.g., solar energy company, rooftop solar India, smart energy solutions) and call seo utility to set title/description.
Ensure semantic headings and keyword-aware copy where natural; set page title and meta description via seo utility.
Ensure semantic headings and keyword-aware copy where natural; set page title and meta description via seo utility.
Ensure semantic headings and keyword-aware copy where natural; set page title and meta description via seo utility.
Ensure semantic headings and keyword-aware copy where natural; set page title and meta description via seo utility.

requirements.summary: Include the required generated solar-themed static images and render them from frontend static assets (no backend image serving).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are saved under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend UI.
Home page hero includes a solar-themed visual.
Projects gallery uses the generated placeholder project images.

file_operations.description: Add the generated Home hero image asset at the exact required path/filename for static serving.
Add the generated Projects placeholder image asset at the exact required path/filename for static serving.
Add the generated Projects placeholder image asset at the exact required path/filename for static serving.
Add the generated Projects placeholder image asset at the exact required path/filename for static serving.
Add the generated logo image asset at the exact required path/filename for static serving.

Render the generated logo in the header using the static asset frontend/public/assets/generated/gkv-logo.dim_512x512.png and ensure it scales well on mobile. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the hero visual using frontend/public/assets/generated/gkv-hero-solar.dim_1600x900.png as a static asset and ensure responsive behavior across breakpoints.

Wire the gallery images to use the generated placeholders: frontend/public/assets/generated/gkv-project-01.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/gkv-project-02.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/gkv-project-03.dim_1200x800.png.
